messages.subject: Re: undigest
messages.msgSnippet: You can also change your settings via email. Send a blank email to: AlwaysLearning-digest@yahoogroups.com   to go to digest mode
messages.messageBody:
You can also change your settings via email. Send a blank email to:

AlwaysLearning-digest@yahoogroups.com to go to digest mode

AlwaysLearning-normal@yahoogroups.com to return to one at a time messages

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] undigest
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/28/01 2:14:26 PM, wordup@mother.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/28/01 2:14:26 PM, wordup@... writes:

<< sorry to be a pain, but please UNdigest my messages -- I find it takes
me even longer to find messages of interest in the digest form. thanks! >>

I did that.

You can all change your own settings, if you can figure out how to get in
yahoogroups, but I don't mind changing them (or one of my Lovely Assistants
can do it).

Sandra

messages.subject: undigest
messages.msgSnippet: sorry to be a pain, but please UNdigest my messages -- I find it takes me even longer to find messages of interest in the digest form.  thanks! -- Jessica
messages.messageBody:
sorry to be a pain, but please UNdigest my messages -- I find it takes
me even longer to find messages of interest in the digest form. thanks!

--
Jessica Kelly
